name: Snayke
description:
Use the arrow keys or tap the sides of the screen to move the snake.

Press P or the button to play portal mode.

Press H or the button to play hard mode.

Press W or the button to play wrap mode.

Press space or the button to pause.

Press R or the button to restart.



Credits

Everything is made by me.

Made using Scratch and converted into an HTML file using HTMLifier
